Votes.Committee: Cultural Affairs, Tourism, Parks And Recreation

Title: Relates to including the promotion and expansion of cricket in the state of New York to the jurisdiction of the state athletic commission
Summary: Relates to including the promotion and expansion of cricket in the state of New York to the jurisdiction of the state athletic commission.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to including the promotion and expansion of cricket in the state of New York to the jurisdiction of the state athletic commission
